justification: Correctly targets B’s taste for high-upside, dual-threat, buy-low injured QB. However, it ignores A’s strict injury-avoidance by asking for an Out QB (David Young) and mislabels him as a stabilizing piece. A already has a stable Tier 2 QB, so depth/consistency worsen. Rationale is generic, omits B’s RB depth and QB context, and likely overestimates acceptance odds.
